content: आहर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (At the end of <ab>comp.</ab>) Bringing, fetching, taking, seizing; समित्कुशफलाहरैः <ls>R. 1. 49.</ls> --रः {@--1@} Taking, seizing. {@--2@} Accomplishing, performing. {@--3@} Offering a sacrifice. {@--4@} Drawing in breath, inhaling. {@--5@} The air so inhaled. {@--6@} Inspiration, breath inspired.
